Unless of course you're like me who just doesn't give a crap often and just accepts the way the world is.

Some times its better to acknowledge it and accept it, rather than to ignore it and not understand it. It should be said that turning a blind eye to the horrible s*** around you and letting it happen isn't the best course of action. Then again, that's usually what most people do anyway. So no loss if you decide that its not worth caring anymore.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e843eb6368722c845b0100#post_53e843eb6368722c845b0100

I didn't say it was, the world is as how it is, I accepted it, but I do my research, doing what I can to learn where all of these problems stem from. Its usually my habit to learn of why we screw ourselves up rather than accept that it happens with little or no reason at all.

The world's filled with all kinds of good and bad things, I accept there's no evil and truly no pure good, everything just shades of grey. But I learn to understand why its like this, rather than just remain ignorant, but that's just me.
